title: go.talks/present: embed video does not play in FF
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Run present to display the attached video.slide file
2. Navigate to localhost:3999 with firefox

What is the expected output?

A playable youtube video on slide #2.


What do you see instead?

Black rectangle.

(Works if viewing with chrome).


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g


Which operating system are you using?

Linux


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go1.2
FF26.0
Chrome 32.0.1700.107
go.tools e3ab4530e405 tip
go.talks 5c1ef7ac81bc tip
Attachments: 1. video.slide (190 bytes)
